author: ryanleeschneider
content: Will the goerli Shepella timestamp be chosen at the next ACD?  Is the plan to choose the mainnet timestamp after goerli forks?  Just trying to get a feel for when is the _soonest_ mainnet might fork.

author: bridge-bot
content: <timbeiko> I assume yes for Goerli, and re: mainnet, it’s unclear if we want to see Goerli go smoothly before we pick a time. I think you’d want it at least 2 weeks after Goerli, and Goerli prob 10ish days at least after ACDE

author: timbeiko
content:
SSZ breakout in ~50m: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/727

And, ~23h from now, we have ACDE: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/729
